markdown:
[Skip to main content](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868065243420-How-do-I-turn-off-the-secure-mobile-pop-up-message-on-the-Customer-booking-page#main-content) * * * Learn how to [disable](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868065243420-How-do-I-turn-off-the-secure-mobile-pop-up-message-on-the-Customer-booking-page#h_01GS10SMZV9A2PFVD9KFHATDYP) the secure mobile pop-up message on the Customer booking page. * * * ## Accessing the features mentioned in this article **Where can I find this feature using the top menu?** Manage > Layout > Booking Page **What more do I need to use this feature?** - [Admin](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868502205212) permissions to configure Booking Page options. **Which Checkfront version supports this feature - classic items, classic products, or both?** - This feature is available in both our classic version using classic items (Inventory > Items) and our classic version using classic products (Inventory > Products).  → [Learn more about products](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868100241052) * * * ## Turning off the secure mobile pop-up message ![Mobile Message](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868109214236) Customers on mobile devices may see the message _Go to our secure mobile booking page?_ with the option to select **OK** or **Cancel**. Customers who click **OK** are redirected to the mobile-friendly Customer booking page. This is a helpful option if you have the booking page embedded in your website (e.g. via the [Booking Widget](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868141953692)) but your website is not optimized for mobile screens. However, this message can be disabled via your Booking Page settings, as described below. ![Layout Booking Page Mobile](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868093431836) To do this, you must uncheck the _Redirect mobile devices to mobile booking page_ (Manage > Layout > Booking Page) setting. Once unchecked, Customers are no longer redirected to the mobile booking page. | | | | --- | --- | | ![Learn More](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868093454108) | Learn more about these topics here:
- [Website Integrations](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/categories/360000576093-Website-Integrations)
- [Introduction to managing booking page layouts](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868193188124) |
